Introduction

Seongmin is a South Korean singer under Starship Entertainment. He is the maknae of the boy group CRAVITY.

On October 7, 2019, Seongmin was introduced as a trainee under Starship's rookie group STARSHIPZ.

The following year, on March 18, 2020, he was revealed to be a member of Starship's upcoming boy group CRAVITY. He officially debuted with them on April 14, with the release of the mini album Hideout: Remember Who We Are - Season1. .
